titleStmt.title: The peoples plea for the exercise of prophesie. Against Mr. Iohn Yates his monopolie. / By Iohn Robinson.
titleStmt.author: Robinson, John, 1575?-1625.
Yates, John, d. ca. 1660.
Brewster, William, 1566 or 7-1644, printer, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Title page within ornamental border; head and tail pieces, initials.
Imperfect: overwritten, and with ms. notes.
Reproduction of original in: Dr. Williams's Library.
